data.rationale:
This is a newly proposed namespace for the module i proposed a
    little while ago called Blog::LiveJournal.

    After further #perl discussion, mainly with Sean Burke, a new and
    improved (now with 50% less poop) namespace of WWW::LiveJournal is
    suggested. The Rationale and what not still hold true :)
